Class MGConfigurationChangeService

java.lang.Object
android.content.Context
android.content.ContextWrapper
android.app.Service
android.app.IntentService
com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.mobilegateway.MGConfigurationChangeService
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2
public class MGConfigurationChangeService
extends android.app.IntentService
Deprecated.
since 6.6.0. CPS component will directly invoke MG APIs.
This class is meant to handle configuration changes in MobileGateway.
